overview: A funny and bittersweet portrayal of the long-time love between two gay ranchers in the patriotic, lottery-crazy land of South Texas. Though they struggle to make end's meet, Mario Borjas--Tejano to the core--and David Ewell, a Texas transplant--have somehow managed to fashion a rural life that has revolved around horses and each other for 14 years.
title: Horse Dreams in BBQ Country
